data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina, Bosnia and Herzegovina
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina, Bosnia and Herzegovina a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina, Bosnia and Herzegovina.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina, Bosnia and Herzegovina, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina, Bosnia and Herzegovina that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bosniak people.
Jesus, please help the 3,717 believers in the state of Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
God, we pray for the believers in Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina, Bosnia and Herzegovina that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.focus_label: Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina, Bosnia and Herzegovina

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina, Bosnia and Herzegovina to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

location.name: Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina
location.full_name: Federacija Bosna i Hercegovina, Bosnia and Herzegovina
